description: Number of minimal ordered covers of a labeled n-set.
references: R. J. Clarke, Covering a set by subsets, Discrete Math., 81 (1990), 147-152.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
formula: E.g.f.: Sum((exp(x)-1)^n*exp(x*(2^n-n-1)), n=0..infinity), cf. A046165. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Sep 01 2005
mathematica: a[0] = 1; a[n_] := Sum[ (-1)^i*Binomial[k, i]*(2^k-1-i)^n, {k, 0, n}, {i, 0, k} ]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 15}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Jan 27 2012, after Michael Somos *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n)=sum(k=0, n, sum(i=0, k, (-1)^i*binomial(k, i)*(2^k-1-i)^n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Oct 16 2006 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, _Michael Somos_
